io.blocko.coinstack

Class CoinStackClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.blocko.coinstack.CoinStackClient

  • public class CoinStackClient
extends Object
    A client class for accessing Bitcoin Blockchain through CoinStack. Provides functionality for creating and managing Bitcoin addresses and transactions.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CoinStackClient()
      Creates a CoinStack client instance that connects to mainnet endpoint Defaults to using credentials from env variables COINSTACK_ACCESS_KEY and COINSTACK_SECRET_KEY

    • Constructor Detail

      • CoinStackClient

        public CoinStackClient()
        Creates a CoinStack client instance that connects to mainnet endpoint Defaults to using credentials from env variables COINSTACK_ACCESS_KEY and COINSTACK_SECRET_KEY

      • CoinStackClient

        public CoinStackClient(String accessKey,
                       String secretKey)
        Creates a CoinStack client instance that connects to mainnet endpoint
        Parameters:
        accessKey - API ACCESS KEY from CoinStack Dashboard
        secretKey - API SECRET KEY from CoinStack Dashboard

      • CoinStackClient

        public CoinStackClient(String accessKey,
                       String secretKey,
                       AbstractEndpoint endpoint)
        Creates a CoinStack client instance with endpoint specified
        Parameters:
        accessKey - API ACCESS KEY from CoinStack Dashboard
        secretKey - API SECRET KEY from CoinStack Dashboard
        endpoint - endpoint to connect to (available: EndPoint.MAINNET, EndPoint.TESTNET)

      • CoinStackClient

        public CoinStackClient(io.blocko.coinstack.backendadaptor.AbstractCoinStackAdaptor coinStackAdaptor)

      • CoinStackClient

        public CoinStackClient(io.blocko.coinstack.model.CredentialsProvider provider,
                       AbstractEndpoint endpoint)
        Creates a CoinStack client instance with endpoint specified
        Parameters:
        endpoint - endpoint to connect to (available: EndPoint.MAINNET, EndPoint.TESTNET)

      • CoinStackClient

        public CoinStackClient(io.blocko.coinstack.model.CredentialsProvider provider,
                       Endpoint endpoint,
                       String[] sslProtocols,
                       String[] sslCipherSuites)
        Creates a CoinStack client instance with endpoint specified and SSL parameters
        Parameters:
        endpoint - endpoint to connect to (available: EndPoint.MAINNET, EndPoint.TESTNET)
        sslProtocols - ssl protocols to enable for HTTPs connection (default: TLSv1.2, TLSv1)
        sslCipherSuites - ssl cipher suites to enable for HTTPs connection (default: TLS_DHE_RSA_WITH_AES_128_CBC_SHA)

    • Method Detail

      • convertEndianness

        public static String convertEndianness(String original)
        Convert an endian of a given string: big-endian to little-endian OR little-endian to big-endian. for example, 34efa513 will be converted to 13a5ef34
        Parameters:
        original - an original string to convert an endian
        Returns:
        a converted string

      • close

        public void close()
        CoinStack client needs to be closed after usage to prevent resource leaks

      • createMultiSigTransaction

        public String createMultiSigTransaction(TransactionBuilder builder,
                                        List<String> privateKeys,
                                        String redeemScript)
                                 throws IOException,
                                        io.blocko.coinstack.exception.CoinStackException
        Create MultiSig transaction. MultiSig Transaction is a transaction of which the condition of redemption requires multi private keys.
        Parameters:
        builder - TransactionBuilder object that Coinstack provides Basic information to build Multisig transaction
        privateKeys - A list of private keys which are required to meet redeem script
        redeemScript - Redeemscript which is initially generated by using multiple private keys to fund Multisig transaction and handed over to receivers.
        Returns:
        transaction signed and ready to be broadcasted in hex-encoded string
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of network failure
        io.blocko.coinstack.exception.InsufficientFundException - in case there is not sufficient fund in private key provided
        io.blocko.coinstack.exception.CoinStackException - in case the amount to transfer is too small to be handled by blockchain

      • createMultiSigTransactionWithPartialSign

        public String createMultiSigTransactionWithPartialSign(TransactionBuilder builder,
                                                       String privateKey,
                                                       String redeemScript)
                                                throws IOException,
                                                       io.blocko.coinstack.exception.CoinStackException
        Create MultiSig transaction with partial sign. This method is used to make a incomplete transaction by using a private key. And this incomplete transaction will delivered to other signers who have another private key.
        Parameters:
        builder - TransactionBuilder object that Coinstack provides Basic information to build Multisig transaction
        privateKey - One of multiple private keys which are required to meet redeem script
        redeemScript - Redeem script which is initially generated by using multiple private keys
        Returns:
        incomplete transaction signed and note ready to be broadcasted in hex-encoded string
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of network failure
        io.blocko.coinstack.exception.InsufficientFundException - in case there is not sufficient fund in private key provided
        io.blocko.coinstack.exception.CoinStackException - in case the amount to transfer is too small to be handled by blockchain

      • createSignedTransaction

        public String createSignedTransaction(AbstractTransactionBuilder builder,
                                      String privateKeyWIF)
                               throws IOException,
                                      io.blocko.coinstack.exception.CoinStackException
        Construct a transaction and sign it using private key
        Parameters:
        builder - Transaction builder to create transaction with
        privateKeyWIF - private key in Wallet Import Format to sign transaction with
        Returns:
        transaction signed and ready to be broadcasted in hex-encoded string
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of network failure
        io.blocko.coinstack.exception.InsufficientFundException - in case there is not sufficient fund in private key provided
        io.blocko.coinstack.exception.CoinStackException - in case the amount to transfer is too small to be handled by blockchain

      • getBalance

        public long getBalance(String address)
                throws IOException,
                       io.blocko.coinstack.exception.CoinStackException
        Fetch current balance of given address
        Parameters:
        address - to view balance of in string format
        Returns:
        balance in satoshi format (e.g. 0.0001 BTC = 10000 satoshi)
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of network failure
        io.blocko.coinstack.exception.CoinStackException

        public String[] getTransactions(String address)
                         throws IOException,
                                io.blocko.coinstack.exception.CoinStackException
        Get transaction history associated with given address
        Parameters:

        IOException - in case of network failure
        io.blocko.coinstack.exception.CoinStackException

      • getTransactions

        public String[] getTransactions(String address,
                                int skip,
                                int limit,
                                int confirmed)
                         throws IOException,
                                io.blocko.coinstack.exception.CoinStackException
        Get transaction history associated with given address
        Parameters:
        address - to view history of in string format
        skip - skip count
        limit - limit count, -1: all
        confirmed - 1: confirmed, 0: not confirmed, -1: all
        Returns:
        list of transaction IDs related to given address
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of network failure
        io.blocko.coinstack.exception.CoinStackException

      • sendTransaction

        public void sendTransaction(String rawTransaction)
                     throws IOException,
                            io.blocko.coinstack.exception.CoinStackException
        Broadcast signed raw transaction to blockchain
        Parameters:
        rawTransaction - a signed transaction in hex-encoded string format ready to be broadcasted
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of network failure
        io.blocko.coinstack.exception.CoinStackException - in case the transaction provided was rejected by blockchain network

      • signMultiSigTransaction

        public String signMultiSigTransaction(String transactionSerialized,
                                      String myPrivateKey,
                                      String redeemScript)
                               throws IOException,
                                      io.blocko.coinstack.exception.CoinStackException
        Add signature to incomplete transaction which is generated by createMultiSigTransactionWithPartialSign This method is to finalize incomplete Multisig transaction with last signature required to meet a redeem script
        Parameters:
        transactionSerialized - Incomplete transaction which is the result of createMultiSigTransactionWithPartialSign
        myPrivateKey -
        redeemScript - Redeem script which is initially generated by using multiple private keys
        Returns:
        transaction signed and ready to be broadcasted in hex-encoded string
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of network failure
        io.blocko.coinstack.exception.InsufficientFundException - in case there is not sufficient fund in private key provided
        io.blocko.coinstack.exception.CoinStackException - in case the amount to transfer is too small to be handled by blockchain

      • stampDocument

        @Deprecated
public String stampDocument(String documentHash)
                                  throws IOException,
                                         io.blocko.coinstack.exception.CoinStackException
        Deprecated. 
        register hash of document on the Blockchain
        Parameters:
        documentHash - a String to be registered on the Blockchain the value should be hex
        Returns:
        result of stamping is blockchain transaction ID and vout, offset value of outputs
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of network failure
        io.blocko.coinstack.exception.MalformedInputException - hash value should be hex value. If it is not, this exception is populated
        io.blocko.coinstack.exception.CoinStackException

      • stampDocument

        public String stampDocument(String privateKeyWIF,
                            String documentHash)
                     throws IOException,
                            io.blocko.coinstack.exception.CoinStackException
        register hash of document on the Blockchain
        Parameters:
        privateKeyWIF - private key in Wallet Import Format to register documentHash
        documentHash - a String to be registered on the Blockchain the value should be hex
        Returns:
        result of stamping is blockchain transaction ID and vout, offset value of outputs
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of network failure
        io.blocko.coinstack.exception.CoinStackException - hash value should be hex value. If it is not, this exception is populated

      • createDataTransaction

        @Deprecated
public String createDataTransaction(String privateKeyWIF,
                                                 long fee,
                                                 byte[] payload)
                                          throws IOException,
                                                 io.blocko.coinstack.exception.CoinStackException
        Deprecated. 
        Construct a transaction for storing raw data and sign it using private key
        Parameters:
        privateKeyWIF - private key in Wallet Import Format to sign transaction with
        payload - 80 byte data to embeded in transaction
        fee - amount of fee to pay to miners (minimum 0.0001 BTC = 10000 satoshi)
        Returns:
        transaction signed and ready to be broadcasted in hex-encoded string
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of network failure
        io.blocko.coinstack.exception.InsufficientFundException - in case there is not sufficient fund in private key provided
        io.blocko.coinstack.exception.CoinStackException - in case the amount to transfer is too small to be handled by blockchain

      • createRawTransaction

        @Deprecated
public String createRawTransaction(String privateKeyWIF,
                                                String destinationAddress,
                                                long amount,
                                                long fee)
                                         throws IOException,
                                                io.blocko.coinstack.exception.CoinStackException
        Deprecated. 
        Construct a transaction for sending bitcoin and sign it using private key
        Parameters:
        privateKeyWIF - private key in Wallet Import Format to sign transactino with
        destinationAddress - address to send fund
        amount - amount of fund to transfer
        fee - amount of fee to pay to miners (minimum 0.0001 BTC = 10000 satoshi)
        Returns:
        transaction signed and ready to be broadcasted in hex-encoded string
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of network failure
        io.blocko.coinstack.exception.InsufficientFundException - in case there is not sufficient fund in private key provided
        io.blocko.coinstack.exception.CoinStackException - in case the amount to transfer is too small to be handled by blockchain

      • getStamp

        public io.blocko.coinstack.model.Stamp getStamp(String stampId)
                                         throws IOException,
                                                io.blocko.coinstack.exception.CoinStackException
        Inquiry the information of Stamping Data and time to stamp, number of confirmations are provided
        Parameters:
        stampId - stampId is the result of stampDocument method which is consisted of txID and vout
        Returns:
        Stamp object containing transaction id, vout, number of confirmations, and date
        Throws:
        IOException
        io.blocko.coinstack.exception.CoinStackException

      • isMainNet

        public boolean isMainNet()
        Get an endpoint connection information. When the client is connected to mainnet, this function returns true. In the other case, when the client is connected to testnet, this will return false.
        Returns:
        whether endpoint is mainnet or not
